name: ident
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a design or symbol, or a short piece of video, used by a company to advertise its products, or by a TV channel to tell people which channel they are watching: The History Channel has a magnificent carved Roman "H" ident. You may recognize him from the BBC ident he appeared in - one of three wheelchair basketball players who spin around in their chairs on a court.
More examplesFewer examplesSoon all the channels were using idents.Instead of our ident a black screen appeared.Write your own alternative take on any film and have it made into a spoof ident, to be screened across the UK in cinemas.
